thread.section_title: Babyonlinedress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Babyonlinedress 的点评意见 | babyonlinedress.com
thread.title: Kierra Reames
thread.title_full: Babyonlinedress 的点评人 Kierra Reames

author: Kierra Reames
title: Kierra Reames
text: Baby Online Dresses is the site to go to if you are looking for a beautiful dress at a low cost! I was a little worried when purchasing the dress but when the dress arrived it was exactly how it was pictured. I was also worried it would not arrive in time before my school prom which is March 25th. I ordered the dress on Feb.15 and received it on March 2. Communication with the seller was also great, I needed to change dress sizes after already placing my order and she was able to reply to my request quickly and change it for me. So, if you are not sure about ordering or afraid it won't be how you expect it to be ... don't worry it will be just fine! This will be my go to site in the future!
